name: Justin Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon from Paso Robles with high tannins and bold structure. Rich flavors of blackberry, cassis, vanilla, and mocha with prominent oak influence. Dry with medium acidity. Pairs excellently with steak, lamb, burgers, and aged cheese.

name: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc
description: Light-bodied Sauvignon Blanc from Marlborough with vibrant acidity and crisp refreshing character. Bright citrus flavors of grapefruit and passion fruit with herbaceous gooseberry notes. Bone dry and zesty. Perfect with seafood, oysters, salads, and fresh goat cheese.

name: Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label Brut
description: Classic Champagne with elegant complexity and fine bubbles. Crisp apple and citrus flavors balanced with toasty brioche and almond notes from extended aging. Dry and refreshing with high acidity. Ideal for celebrations, appetizers, and oysters.

name: La Crema Pinot Noir
description: Medium-bodied Pinot Noir from Sonoma Coast with silky tannins and elegant structure. Bright red fruit flavors of cherry and raspberry complemented by earthy mushroom and spice notes. Dry with balanced acidity. Pairs beautifully with duck, salmon, mushroom dishes, and soft cheeses.

name: Chateau Ste. Michelle Riesling
description: Light-bodied off-dry Riesling from Columbia Valley with aromatic stone fruit character. Luscious peach and apricot flavors balanced by bright lime acidity and honey sweetness. Refreshing and versatile. Excellent with spicy Asian cuisine, Thai food, pork, and fruity desserts.

name: Duckhorn Merlot
description: Full-bodied Napa Valley Merlot with velvety smooth texture and rich complexity. Ripe plum and black cherry flavors layered with cocoa and cedar notes. Dry with soft tannins and medium acidity. Pairs wonderfully with roasted meats, beef stew, pasta with red sauce, and mature cheeses.

name: Cakebread Chardonnay
description: Full-bodied Napa Chardonnay with rich creamy texture from barrel fermentation. Ripe apple and pear flavors enhanced by vanilla and buttery notes from oak aging. Dry and elegant with balanced acidity. Perfect with lobster, roasted chicken, creamy pasta, and brie cheese.

name: Catena Malbec
description: Full-bodied Mendoza Malbec with intense fruit concentration and bold structure. Deep blackberry and plum flavors accented by violet floral notes and black pepper spice. Dry with firm tannins. Excellent with grilled steak, barbecue ribs, empanadas, and sharp cheddar.

name: Whispering Angel Rosé
description: Light-bodied Provence rosé with delicate pale pink color and crisp refreshing character. Subtle strawberry and melon flavors with citrus brightness and mineral finish. Bone dry with vibrant acidity. Perfect for warm weather, Mediterranean cuisine, salads, and light seafood.

name: Frescobaldi Chianti Rufina
description: Medium-bodied Tuscan Sangiovese with bright acidity and rustic charm. Fresh cherry flavors with savory tomato, herbal, and leather notes. Dry with medium tannins and high acidity. Classic pairing with pizza, tomato-based pasta, grilled vegetables, and pecorino cheese.

name: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc
description: Light-bodied Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc with intense aromatic complexity. Vibrant grapefruit and passion fruit flavors with lemongrass and subtle bell pepper notes. Crisp and dry with racy acidity. Superb with oysters, sushi, ceviche, and goat cheese salad.

name: Rodney Strong Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Full-bodied Sonoma Cabernet with powerful structure and aging potential. Concentrated blackcurrant and dark chocolate flavors complemented by tobacco and cedar complexity. Dry with firm tannins. Excellent with prime rib, lamb chops, grilled portobello mushrooms, and aged gouda.

name: Chateau Montelena Chardonnay
description: Full-bodied Napa Chardonnay with balanced elegance and refined complexity. Bright lemon and green apple flavors layered with hazelnut and honey notes. Dry with restrained oak and medium acidity. Pairs beautifully with seared scallops, roasted chicken, risotto, and comté cheese.

name: Antinori Chianti Classico Riserva
description: Medium-bodied Tuscan Sangiovese with elegant structure and aging complexity. Refined red cherry and violet flavors enhanced by warm spice and tobacco notes. Dry with firm acidity and polished tannins. Classic pairing with osso buco, wild boar ragu, bistecca fiorentina, and aged pecorino.

name: La Marca Prosecco
description: Light-bodied Italian Prosecco with fresh lively bubbles and approachable fruit character. Crisp green apple and pear flavors with honeysuckle floral notes and lemon zest brightness. Off-dry with vibrant acidity. Perfect for brunch, aperitivo, fruit desserts, and celebration toasts.
